long_description: REI dog boots help protect your pup's paws from ice, hot sand, rocks, thorns, broken glass and other rough terrain. Strong, flexible recycled tire-rubber soles and toes offer long wear and great traction on wet or dry surfaces. Boots secure around the legs with adjustable rip-and-stick closures. Durable, 500-denier Cordura(R) nylon uppers flex with each step for comfort. REI dog boots secure around the ankles below your dog's carpal pads; the boots should leave room in the paw area, allowing the paw to spread when bearing weight. Note: keep your dogs nails trimmed to extend the life of the boots.
short_description: REI dog boots help protect your pup's paws from ice, hot sand, rocks, thorns, broken glass and other rough terrain.
